## Four Categories

1. Traditional Only
Includes Traditional Variables with No Advanced 'Look-Alike'

* Hits
* Walks
* Strikeouts
* Total Bases

2. Traditional Comparison
Includes Traditional Variables with Advanced 'Look-Alike'

* Batting Average
* OPS
* Home Runs
* RBI
* OBP
* Runs

3. Advanced Comparison
Includes Advanced Variables with Traditional 'Look-Alike'

* BABIP
* OPS
* ISO
* wRC
* wOBA
* wRAA

4. Advanced Only
Includes Advanced Variables with no Traditional 'Look-Alike'

* Clutch
* OWn%
* RE24
